hadiths.text: It was narrated that Aishah said:"It is as if I can see the glistening of the perfume on the head of the Messenger of Allah when he is in Ihram." Ahmad bin Nasr (one of the narrators) said in his narration: "The glistening of the perfume of musk in the parting (of the hair) of the Messenger of Allah

chapter.eng-name: It is Permissible to put on perfume when Entering Ihram
